Pre-Game Insights: Chicago and Minnesota face off in non-conference action.
BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE: Timberwolves -6.5; over/under is 225
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chicago went 39-43 overall with a 20-21 record at home during the 2023-24 season.
Minnesota finished 56-26 overall, 37-15 in Western Conference play and 26-15 on the road last season.
The Bulls shot 47.0% from the field and 35.8% from 3-point range last season.
The Timberwolves shot 48.5% from the field and 38.7% from 3-point range last season.
INJURIES: Bulls: Jalen Smith: day to day (knee), Zach LaVine: day to day (hip), Josh Giddey: day to day (illness), Lonzo Ball: out (wrist), Patrick Williams: day to day (shoulder).
Others: The game will be held in Chicago on Thursday, 8 p.m. EST.
